title: DigitalMonk
author: DigitalMonk
content: I want to know about first Bitcoin News published in the mainstream news Media. Also I am interested to see the first YouTube video. I want to analyse it to understand its contents and its nature for a reference. Can any body help to find it. Thank you for your help.

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: It would be worth you looking through the Press section of the forum, in particular this thread , which has the oldest Bitcoin news https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=1958.2100Hopefully this will help you

comments.author: GreatArkansas
comments.body: This is not from News or Youtube video but this is being aired with big coverage with a lot of viewers before.I believe that this is the first that Bitcoin is being aired on a television movieThe Good Wife is the name of the movie from 2012. The price of Bitcoin when this Bitcoin is mentioned in this movie was only around $3.Here's the scene from the movie: https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=-fazu1rgr9khttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=SohEf5dF45gRead more here: https://www.reddit.com/r/Bitcoin/comments/lszkpw/the_first_bitcoin_reference_in_television_history/

comments.author: Uang_kartal
comments.body: if you only rely on youtube, have you realized how complicated clickbait is for creators? I was lost in 2017 about hyip and it started from youtube.if you currently manage this forum, thank God it's a good medium by discussing you will know which facts or plans. either history or vulnerabilities that have been exceeded, either bitcoin or other cryptocurrencies.

comments.author: Z-tight
comments.body: That is from a very long time ago, and it will be hard to find, there must have been a lot of news published about bitcoin in its early times, some of which may have been taken down and as such lost, making it harder to know which is the first, the same for youtube videos, there are so many of it, and since you are particular about the 'first' of the two things you are looking for, i don't feel anybody can direct you with certainty that this news or video was the first published, maybe 'one of the earliest' is easier to seek.I don't know the reference you need it for anyway, but i feel the bitcoin whitepaper should be enough for you, it has everything about bitcoin on it, and it was published by the creator of bitcoin Satoshi when the network started, so it should be adequate for you as the first material on bitcoin, and its content can be used for your reference.

comments.author: Republikcoin.com
comments.body: Quote from: DigitalMonk on August 28, 2022, 08:09:54 AMI want to know about first Bitcoin News published in the mainstream news Media. Also I am interested to see the first YouTube video. I want to analyse it to understand its contents and its nature for a reference. Can any body help to find it. Thank you for your help. Actually there are many news and news sources that you can make reference if it is about the history of the birth of Bitcoin. But if you want news that was made in late 2008 and early 2009, then it's a little hard to find now because Satoshi Nakamoto first introduced Bitcoin on October 31, 2008 which was then officially released to the public in early 2009.And if your goal is only for reference to Bitcoin. So try to find more references in the form of articles about Bitcoin from now on. But if you want a reference in the form of a youtube video, I can only share three videos that have been uploaded to the youtube platform since 11 years ago and I think you can use it as a reference although I can't be sure if it's the first video for Bitcoin or not.https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=ejiqbzqmxSEhttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=Um63OQz3bjohttps://www.youtube.com/watch?v=jrikj7fy4MU

comments.author: Mbitr
comments.body: If you are looking for the first “printed” news about Bitcoin , have a look at this thread over in collectibles https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5148433.140This may well be the first “printed” news about Bitcoin???

comments.author: Jeger.Kiting
comments.body: Quote from: DigitalMonk on August 28, 2022, 08:09:54 AMI want to know about first Bitcoin News published in the mainstream news Media. Also I am interested to see the first YouTube video. I want to analyse it to understand its contents and its nature for a reference. Can any body help to find it. Thank you for your help. There are tons of video sources and historical news about the origin of Bitcoin, but I don't know which one is really genuine about this, maybe you can take a look and find out in this thread. https://bitcointalk.org/index.php?topic=5139531.0If in the thread I provided you are unsure of what they provide, you can look it up through articles you may actually believe.

comments.author: BlackHatCoiner
comments.body: I don't know if they were the very first, but:YouTube video: https://youtu.be/YmPg4V-YE0k (Dec 31, 2010)No-coin article: https://web.archive.org/web/20101215103112/http://undergroundeconomist.com/post/1528511369 (Dec 15, 2010)Here are some other attacking articles:https://apenwarr.ca/log/?m=201105 (May 08, 2011)http://tav.espians.com/why-bitcoin-will-fail-as-a-currency.html (Jun 07, 2011)https://web.archive.org/web/20110811144818/http://www.forbes.com/sites/timworstall/2011/06/20/so-thats-the-end-of-bitcoin-then (Jun 20, 2011)

comments.author: budi691
comments.body: maybe I don't have a recommendation for you from youtube, but look for friends who really understand Bitcoin because direct learning is easier to understand, and ask a lot of questions in this forum because in this forum there are many people who understand more about Bitcoin,

comments.author: DigitalMonk
comments.body: Thank you all. I am reading  a lot and watching the videos. There some things that interest me. So I am asking you a lots of question. Without asking question it is difficult for me to find the answer. One more question:  which company actually first sold Bitcoin in the NY Stock Exchange ?  Is it Bitinstant ?
